document.full_text: facebook is providing european regulators with information about its use of facial recognition technology, in response to concerns about the company's roll-out of the technology's availability outside of the united states.
document.title: facebook gives regulators info on facial recognition
lines_and_colors: facebook is providing european regulators with information about its use of facial recognition technology, in response to concerns about the company's roll-out of the technology's availability outside of the united states.
